https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uscGLHrhEl6CUvifkGvZ9ik7pVF.jpg An odd director leaves for Hollywood to shoot a film via Skype and cellphones. 14 actors and actresses are devastated after being dumped by the director. Now, the 14 actors and actress prepare for the counterattack. Behind the Camera
